## TridionActivityDefinition type

Represents the data of a Tridion proprietary Activity Definition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TridionActivityDefinition = ActivityDefinition & {
    ActivityType?: ActivityType;
    AllowOverrideDueDate?: boolean;
    ExpirationScript?: string;
    ExpirationScriptType?: string;
    FinishApprovalStatus?: Link;
    NextActivityDefinitions?: Array<Link>;
    PerformingTimeout?: number;
    Script?: string;
    ScriptType?: string;
};
```
